While Paula Abdul may still bash Simon Cowell , it sounds like a classic love/hate relationship Live To Dance, which returned Paula Abdul to her first love of dance. I'm overwhelmed by the whole process but it's been a labor of love from the moment I came on board. I had a vision that I wanted to produce and it's finally here. It's out there. I'm doing it and it's been fun mentoring the acts. They are all so diverse. It's been lovely. Last week, the audience was treated to clips of Paula Abdul mentoring all of the semi-finalists and giving them tips on their dancing.
